duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive digital marketing strategies to promote and differentiate commercial real estate properties online.
Build and maintain long-lasting client relationships through consultative sales methods to drive advertising revenue.
Prospect new clients and drive sales using CoStar Group’s extensive property data.
Collaborate with internal teams to drive sales revenue and enhance product effectiveness.
Develop expertise in digital advertising strategies and commercial real estate trends within specific market territory.
Conduct regular in-person meetings with clients, including travel outside of the driving radius of the office location.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree from an accredited not-for-profit University or College, required. Master's degree preferred.
